citation.article-title: Reclassification of Thermoanaerobium acetigenum as Caldicellulosiruptor acetigenus comb. nov. and emendation of the genus description.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Caldicellulosiruptor Rainey et al. 1995

The description is the same as that given by Rainey et al. (1994) with the addition that some members do not possess the capacity to degrade crystalline cellulose or filter paper and cannot use cellulose as a carbon and energy source, but can hydrolyse CMC.
